summary.Title: Customer Service Specialist - Nordics
summary.Presentation: On behalf of our client – an international company with 2,000 people employed worldwide, we are looking for a serviceminded and highly motivated individual to join our clients Nordic team a

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
On behalf of our client – an international company with 2,000 people employed worldwide, we are looking for a serviceminded and highly motivated individual to join our clients Nordic team as a Customer Service Specialist.

Customer Service Specialist represents the voice of customer in Kollmorgen. The job holder is responsible for translating customers’ needs to other departments and make sure our customers  are satisfied with both our products and services.


Duties & Responsibilities:

  • Placing orders
    • Price and order check as part of the order confirmation
    • Enter the order in the system //Oracle//
    • Confirms orders
    • Coordination of internal and external logistics processes (e.g. prototypes, etc.)
  • Monitors customer satisfaction and requirements and passes this on to the production team
  • Clarification, review and creation of credit notes in accordance with Finance
  • After sales care
  • Timely coordination and support of exceptional customer requirements
  • Reporting


Qualifications

Job Requirements

  • Must be able to develop relationships at all levels
  • Must be able to work closely with global Manufacturing and Quality teams
  • Strong oral and written communication skills
  • Strong planning and organization skills
  • Strong computer skills are required
  • Ability to multi-task in a fast-paced environment
  • Must be able to manage a flexible schedule
  • Adaptability to Change
  • Willingness to travel
  • Ideally you have experience from global companies with business-to-business environment

Education and/or experience

  • Bachelor’s degree
  • Experience within previous admin or CS role is preferred
  • Languages: both English and Nordic language
  • Above standard knowledge of IT systems – MS Excell, PowerPoint Outllook, MRP knowledge is a plus (Oracle/SAP)


Information

  • The position is full time
  • Preferred starts date is as soon as possible
  • The role is based in Vejstrup – zipcode 5882


Apply

 If you are interested and feel you are the right person for the job, do not hesitate to send a short application along with your resume. TEMP-TEAM A/S is responsible for this recruitment and all inquiries must be directed to TEMP-TEAM.If you have questions not answered in the above, please reach out to Senior Recruiter, Maria Mardfeldt at +45 63125344 or on e-mail: mama@temp-team.dk


Regarding corona               
We are taking the corona situation very serious and follow the rules and guidelines given by the Government and Danish institutions; Sundhedsstyrelsen, Udenrigsministeriet og politiet.

We value personal meetings and appreciate the possibility of having interviews in our offices. However, we also offer interviews on Teams or Skype.

TEMP-TEAM

TEMP-TEAM A/S is a national recruitment and temp agency with eight local branches in Denmark. We have more than 40 years of experience within staffing and covers a wide range of branches. We provide an excellent service of high quality and a close personal contact to our candidates and clients. 

TEMP-TEAM is a part of JuhlerGroup - an international group of recruitment agencies.
